snippets.excerpt: Matriarchal trading confederation where lineage determines trade routes. Eldest daughters inherit routes, youngest sons become diplomats. Family bonds override national loyalty. Disputes settled through competitive storytelling contests judged by grandmothers.
snippets.conflict_hook: New trade route discovered, but it crosses sacred ancestral lands. Traditionalists vs. expansionists. Storytelling contest becomes high-stakes political battle.
rp_cues: family names matter more than titles
trade agreements sealed with family bonds

snippets.excerpt: Nomadic warrior culture that follows seasonal migrations of magical beasts. Warriors prove worth by taming beasts, not killing them. Leadership changes with each migration cycle. Those who bond with beasts gain their abilities temporarily.
snippets.conflict_hook: Magical beasts are disappearing. Culture faces extinction. Some want to settle, others to find new beasts. Outsiders hunt the beasts for profit, creating war.

snippets.excerpt: Merchant republic where wealth determines citizenship. Anyone can become a citizen by accumulating enough trade credits. Laws favor commerce over tradition. Information is the most valuable currency. Secrets are bought and sold openly.
snippets.conflict_hook: Ancient noble families losing power to new merchant class. They plot to restore old system. Meanwhile, a trade war threatens to collapse the economy. Information brokers profit from both sides.

snippets.excerpt: Scholarly theocracy where knowledge is divine. Priests are also researchers. Heresy is questioning without evidence. Libraries are temples. Experiments are rituals. Discovery is revelation. The god is literally the sum of all knowledge.
snippets.conflict_hook: Discovery threatens core doctrine. Some want to suppress it, others to revise doctrine. The god itself seems conflicted. Heretics become prophets. Knowledge becomes dangerous.

snippets.excerpt: Clan-based society where honor debts bind families for generations. A favor must be repaid, even by descendants. Blood feuds last centuries. Hospitality is absolute law. Guest-right is sacred. Breaking it curses the entire clan.
snippets.conflict_hook: Ancient debt comes due, but repayment would destroy the clan. Breaking the debt would curse them. A third party offers to pay, but demands something worse. Heroes must find a way to honor the debt without destruction.
